cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on May 12, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1448, Puppies Assisting Wounded Servicemembers for Veterans Therapy Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 38 (Monday, March 1, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H882-H883]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. STIVERS:
H.R. 1448.
[[Page H883]]
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 13
The Congress shall have Power to provide and maintain a
Navy.
Article I, Section 8, Clause 12
To raise and support Armies, but no Appropriation of Money
to that Use shall be for a longer Term than two Years
Article I, Section 8, Clause 14
To make Rules for the Government and Regulation of the land
and naval Forces.
title: PAWS for Veterans Therapy Act
